column5: And for some years he's been asking me to paint a scene...This is it  King Of Kings  24 x 36
Very nice Terrance. I sent it to my mudder.She will love it aswell. Great work,as always.
Thanks ...Mercky....Davey....Joey ...and Misfishy (yours did'nt end with a "Y"  Bri--wish yur mudder a Happy Easter
Wow another amazing piece. Always a joy looking at your work.  Thanks for sharing.
The thread title had me expecting a good joke...  Great work though!
those are some angry looking clouds...  nice work
